verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — Special counsel Robert Mueller [V: has] given a list of almost four dozen questions to lawyers for President Donald Trump as part of his investigation into Russian meddling in the 2016 election and whether Trump obstructed justice , according to a report published in The New York Times ...
